title: Where can I dispose of a broken TV in Brunswick County?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5173 http://www.brunswickcountync.gov/Departments/OperationServices/SolidWasteRecycling/RecyclingCenters.aspx Although a new law bans electronics such as TVs from disposal in landfills, the items can be dropped off at the Brunswick County landfill for recycling. It's on Landfill Road, near the new Brunswick Community Hospital in Supply.
